1.Title: Leisure Moment
1.Description: When Piper's <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Tire Spin</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Engine Spin</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> hits an enemy with a spinning slash, there is a 50% chance to gain an additional stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Power</color>. The maximum stack limit of <color=#FFFFFF>Power</color> is increased to 30.
1.Lore:
One ordinary morning at Sons of Calydon, Piper lets out a lazy yawn.
"Good morning—"
"Can we have another relaxing day today? It's important to take it easy, or else lil ol' me might end up working meself to death—"

2.Title: Motivation
2.Description: During <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Tire Spin</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Engine Spin</color>, Piper's movement speed increases. When using <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: One Trillion Tons</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Really Heavy</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> to launch a downward smash that hits an enemy, the <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> dealt by the move is increased by 10%. For each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Power</color>, this buff is further increased by 1%.
2.Lore:
A bit of effort now means more rest later.
Though, it'd be even better if I didn't have to put in any effort at all — Piper stretches, pats the soft bed in her truck, and lies down.

3.Title: Truck Expert
3.Lore:
Piper is always all about trucks.
Even when she's fast asleep, the rumble of an engine snaps her awake in an instant:
"100 horsepower, 5-ton capacity... must be the new light truck from Three Gates Industries!"

4.Title: Refined Techniques
4.Description: Whenever a squad member inflicts an Attribute Anomaly on an enemy, Piper recovers 20 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 30s.
4.Lore:
Riding with Piper is a heart-pounding experience.
By the time she drawls out, "Hold~ on~ tight~," the truck is already barreling down the road.
She always gets you to your destination fast—though your nerves might take a hit.

5.Title: Personal Hobbies
5.Lore:
Piper seems to have some hobbies that are not what you'd expect from her.
"This horse looks like a real runner... Hmm, but not many people are betting on it. Guess the one with the higher win rate is the safer bet..."
"Burp— Nitro-Fuel... I can drink more... Gimme another one!"

6.Title: Mild Excitement
6.Description: Increases the duration limit of <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Engine Spin</color> by 2s and extends the duration of <color=#FFFFFF>Power</color> by 4s.
6.Lore:
As you may already know, Piper's biggest dream is to live a life of perpetual relaxation.
But right now, her usually half-closed eyes are surprisingly bright and alert.
"If it's for you... I suppose lil ol' me can try a little harder~"

MathSkill.Title: Additional Ability: Synced Acceleration
MathSkill.Description:
When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Piper has 20 or more stacks of <color=#FFFFFF>Power</color>, all squad members' DMG is increased by 18%.

128100001.Title: Basic Attack: Load Up and Roll Out
128100001.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 4 slashes, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

128110001.Title: Basic Attack: Load Up and Roll Out

128100002.Title: Special Attack: Tire Spin
128100002.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Piper spins and launches a sweeping slash around her, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Special> to extend the skill duration, unleashing increasingly powerful spinning slashes and increasing the charge level of the skill up to 2 times.
If the skill is used after the first 3 hits of a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>, you can quickly activate <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Tire Spin</color> of an increased charge level.
During the skill activation, Anti-Interrupt level increases, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.

128100003.Title: Special Attack: One Trillion Tons
128100003.Description:
While <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Tire Spin</color> is active, release <IconMap:Icon_Special> to trigger a downward smash attack based on the charge level of <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Tire Spin</color>, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

128100004.Title: EX Special Attack: Engine Spin
128100004.Description:
With enough Energy, continue holding <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> after <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Tire Spin</color> reaches maximum charge level to activate:
Rapidly spins, unleashing powerful spinning slashes around her and dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
This skill consumes Energy continuously for up to 3s.
During the skill activation, Anti-Interrupt level increases, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.

128100005.Title: EX Special Attack: Really Heavy
128100005.Description:
During <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Engine Spin</color>, release <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Piper unleashes a downward smash attack, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
If the duration of <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Engine Spin</color> reaches its limit or Energy drops to 20, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Really Heavy</color> will automatically activate.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

128100006.Title: Dodge: Handbrake Drift
128100006.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

128100007.Title: Dash Attack: Pedal to the Metal
128100007.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

128100008.Title: Dodge Counter: Power Drift
128100008.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Unleash a downward smash attack in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

128110028.Title: Dash Attack: Pedal to the Metal

128100009.Title: Chain Attack: Buckle Up
128100009.Description:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful downward smash at enemies ahead in a large area, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

128100010.Title: Ultimate: Hold~ On~ Tight~
128100010.Description:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Rapidly spins, unleashing powerful spinning slashes at enemies in a large area ahead, followed by a downward smash, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

128100012.Title: Quick Assist: Brake Tap
128100012.Description:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Launches a downward smash attack at enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

128100013.Title: Defensive Assist: Emergency Brake
128100013.Description:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</color> when the character is under intense attacks.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

128100014.Title: Assist Follow-Up: Overtaking Maneuver
128100014.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Charge and slash enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
